projects.title: Coinbase
projects.main_text: is a cryptocurrency website powered by CoinGeko API. It showcases the most popular and trending cryptocurrencies. Website offers fuctional login page powered by Firebase. Each coin has a designated page with comprehensive information including prices and changes.

projects.title: Rock, Paper & Scissors game
projects.main_text: is a simple, yet timeless game that can be played against a computer opponent. The objective of the game is to choose either rock, paper, or scissors, with the goal of defeating the opponent's choice.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.main_text: was made by me for me. It showcase my projects, brief information about me and functional contact form. Website was made primarily with React and Tailwind.

projects.title: Musicity
projects.main_text: is my upcoming Bachelor degree and biggest project yet! Musicity is powered by Spotify API and Genius API. Users can find here their personal Spotify statistics, search through Spotify library for a songs/albums/artists, check the lyrics & learn new stuff about their favorite tracks or artists all in one place.
